titleStmt.title: The Qualifications established by His Majesty and the Lords of the Admirality December the 18th, 1677, without which no person is to be thenceforth held capable of the imployment of a leiutenant [sic] in any of His Majesties ships

notesStmt.note: "By command of His Majesty and the Lords of the Admirality."
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
